description.en:
1-3) A Hateful Person
Third-year student Bai is the beautiful prefect with an angelic smile - that allures the students into obeying his orders. However, his kouhai Chiaki always defies Bai and the latter has no idea why Chiaki hates him. Nor does Chiaki understand why Bai hates him so much that he never reprimands him for his sloppiness. Each secretly wishes to know what's on the other's mind... but how will they go about it?

4) The Day That Prince Charming Will Come
The pitiful freshman has been dumped for the 4th time even though it has only been 6 months since starting school. While he was thinking that things can't get worst, he gets a bucket load of cold water dumped on him while he was crying his eyes out.

5) Love Rivals
The beautiful bartender has women throwing themselves at him even though he is openly gay and very monogamous. His partner on the other hand, is bisexual and busy chasing skirts. How will he handle his betrayal time after time?

6) Emergency
The lecturer is a man of science, but has his beliefs turned upside down when he accidentally broke an antique and sets a spirit loose.
